channel.title: Tyler's BJJ Knowledge
channel.description: Last 10 notes on Tyler's BJJ Knowledge

item.title: De La Riva & Reversed De La Riva
item.description: Game 1: Setup Top player is standing and places one leg near the butt of bottom., Bottom player gets into their choice of De La Riva or Reversed De La Riva.

item.title: Nogi takedowns
item.description: Warmup: Break falls Ashi Waza flow pulling - Attacker: Start: Get 1 collar tie and one outside (or wrist) grip.

item.title: Open Guard Passing and Retention
item.description: This workout was adapted from from Volume 1 & Volume 3 .

item.title: Balancing Weight training and BJJ
item.description: Summary Training more then you can recover from is not a good idea. When lifting lift full range of motion 35:00 weights first is a good choice.
